com.revature.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller will help with communicating with any requests that pertains to a user.
    Author:
    Jose Rivera, Brandon Morris

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/auth",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public User login(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                      User user,
                                                                                                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
        Method to accept a POST request to login a user. Will accept a string array that contains the user's credentials being the username and password.
        Returns:
        The new user that was logged in, or null if the user was unable to be logged in.

      • registerUser

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/add",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public User registerUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                            User user)
        Method to accept a POST request to register a user. Will accept a string array that contains the user information to create a user and add them to the database.
        Returns:
        The new user that was added, or null if the user was unable to be added to the database.

      • getUserFriends

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @GetMapping(value="/friends",
            consumes="application/json",
            produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<User> getUserFriends(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                               User user,
                                                                                                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
        Method to accept a GET request to retrieve the Friends List for the given user. Will accept a user_id, which will be used to get the friends by user_is from the Junction Table User_Friends
        Returns:
        The current friends list, or null if the user was unable to be added to the database.

      • updateUserFriends

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/friends",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<User> updateUserFriends(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                     UpdateFriendsDTO updateFriendsDTO,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
        Deprecated. As of 2019.28.03. This feature abandoned to focus on other concerns.
        Parameters:
        Request - Body. Takes in a data transfer object containing a User object and a String for the friend to add.
        Returns:
        The current friends list, or null if the user was unable to be added to the database.

      • getTags

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @GetMapping(value="/tags",
            produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<Tag> getTags()
        Method to accept a GET request to receive all the tags that have been stored in the database
        Returns:
        A list of all the tags, or an empty list if no tags are found

      • subscribeToGame

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/tags/subscribe",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public Tag subscribeToGame(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[] ids)
        Method to accept a POST request to receive an id to get the tag and add it to the user's tag
        Returns:
        A valid tag, or null if no tag is found

      • subscribeToGame

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/tags/getforuser",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<Tag> subscribeToGame(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                          int id)
        Method to accept a POST request to return all the user's tags
        Returns:
        A valid tag list, or null if no tag list is found
